features: ANTIOXIDANTS ARE THE ANSWER – Protect and preserve your skin from harmful environmental factors with powerful antioxidants. Skin becomes visibly plump and soft to the touch thanks to the Vitamin C paired with potent natural extracts that inhibit cell damage.

GORGEOUS GLOWING SKIN – Acne spots, bumpy skin, and redness make for dull, uneven, and imperfect complexions. Say goodbye to these facial flaws and get radiantly smooth skin with the Vitamin C + Ferulic Acid Antioxidant Glow Facial Mist!

SUPERCHARGED C – On its own, vitamin C is great for oily and dry skin. But sometimes problematic skin needs something more, and that’s where ferulic acid comes in. As a power-boosting antioxidant, ferulic acid stabilizes and strengthens vitamin C, magnifying the glow mist’s healing abilities.

BREAKTHROUGH HYDRATION TECHNOLOGY – Revolutionary technology helps lock in moisture like never before. Advanced Clinicals’ groundbreaking AquaSpheres penetrate each layer of skin to increase moisture up to 88%.

VITAMIN C – Incorporating a Vitamin C into your daily skincare routine can help to promote a more healthy, radiant, & youthful-looking complexion. Vitamin C helps promote an even skin tone, while also helping stimulate collagen production to improve skin elasticity + firmness. Vitamin C also helps to minimize redness or irritation in the skin, helps protect from environmental stressors like UV rays, and helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, sun damage.
body.description: Gentle skin toner is safe for all skin types helps prepare your skin to absorb a facial serum, facial oil, or facial moisturizer. Anti-aging face mist doesn’t only hydrate your skin but also helps tighten your skin to give your skin a firmer appearance. Ferulic Acid protects your skin from pollution and free radicals; helping improve the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and sagging skin.Get Glowing with Advanced ClinicalsBetween harmful sunlight, chemical-filled skincare products, and simply getting older, skin can become dull, dry, and damaged. Battling blemishes and warding off wrinkles just got easier with Advanced Clinicals’ Vitamin C + Ferulic Acid Antioxidant Glow Toner!Concentrated Ingredients, Incredible ResultsAdvanced Clinicals combines vitamin C facial and ferulic acid with nature’s premium extracts to formulate a formidable moisturizing toner:Cranberry and Raspberry Fruit Extracts – protect the skin by limiting free radicals while repairing sun damage.Pure Rosewater – reduces redness.Peptides – help skin become youthful and radiant since it stimulates collagen production.Skincare Shouldn't be ComplicatedWith this face mist, you can moisturize anytime, anywhere. See and feel your skin become healthier and more hydrated every day by following these simple steps:Cleanse your face, then pat it dry.Apply your toner.Close your eyes and spray a couple pumps of the Vitamin C + Ferulic Acid Antioxidant Glow Facial Mist on your face and neck.Continue with your moisturizer and makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and customer service
reviews.reviewText: Exceptional customer support on a shipping issue with the product, and the spray has been fantastic under moisturizer or oil (depending on day). I think the glycerin is a great touch for extra moisture and bonus points for a very well-dispersing spray nozzle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, skin brightening, pleasant smell
reviews.reviewText: Love the refreshed moisturized feel if skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for lightening spots from sun exposure
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for dark spots on my face from sun exposure. I have been very happy with the results of lightening of the spots. I use this in the morning as part of my routine - right after washing my face but before serum and moisturizer. I do not spray directly on my face - I spray 3 pumps on clean, dry hands and pat on my face to get better coverage. It dries quickly and I also find that is not tightening, gives a bit of moisture to the skin. Oddly enough, I have also noticed the fine lines around my eyes are also less noticeable. I am currently on my third bottle of this product and will continue to use - positive results for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not sure yet what this product does over the long term but it sure does feel good every morning! The scent is light, not overpowering, and very refreshing. It makes the skin feel moist without grease of lotions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is incredible
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product every single day for like 5 months now and I'm only halfway through the bottle. I spray it on immediately after washing my face and let it absorb before putting on hyaluronic acid serum as well as my moisturizer. Ever since I've introduced this into my daily routine any hyperpigmentation that I had on my face has faded away I do not get as much acne at all my skin is more elastic and vibrant. I am 40 and I'm constantly assumed to be in my late 20s. It feels so nice for people to think I'm so much younger LOL and I definitely believe that this product is part of why.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars moist, but feels sticky a tad
reviews.reviewText: I just received and the bottle came damaged leaking in the box it was shipped in, due to that it had no cap on the spray nozzle as it should have, so my average rating has more to do with product not arriving in new condition.I just sprayed it on and my skin feels a little sticky, so not liking that either and don't care for the smell either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cannot say enough!!!
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost this gives my face such a beautiful glow. I also use it after I apply my makeup as a setting spray, as well at night after moisturizing.Great product will not stop using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me gusta mucho.
reviews.reviewText: Me siento bien fresquita cuando me lo pongo me encanta.
